chapters.title: Prologue: The First Message
chapters.info: Sebban Balwer, p. 54 (62)—Personal secretary to Pedron Niall. He has knobby shoulders and skinny legs. He believes nothing he is told. The post is actually a ruse; the pinch-faced man is actually the Master of Spies for the Children of the Light, and the Spymaster presented to the world is just a decoy. See also Niall, Pedron; Omerna, Abdel.
